code:
module TopModule (
    input  logic clk,  // Clock signal
    input  logic d,    // Data input
    input  logic r,    // Active high synchronous reset
    output logic q     // Output
);

always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
    if (r) begin
        q <= 1'b0; // Reset output to 0
    end else begin
        q <= d;    // Capture data input
    end
end

endmodule
